title: We Married to Divorce - Novel Updates
tags: Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Business Management   Calm Protagonist   Celebrities   Character Growth   Charming Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Couple Growth   Cunning Protagonist   Cute Protagonist   Cute Story   Determined Protagonist   Early Romance   Engagement   Family Conflict   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Forced Marriage   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Jealousy   Leadership   Loyal Subordinates   Management   Marriage   Mature Protagonist   Modern Day   Past Plays a Big Role   Personality Changes   Popular Love Interests   Power Couple   Romantic Subplot   Siblings   Wealthy Characters
author: 플아다
description:
Seung Hee, the chairman of her own asset management company, was to be married before thirty!

Signed off by her father when she was only five years old, she was to marry Han Moo Chul, a charming man that had the kind of face that stopped you in your tracks. Moreover, he was the grandson of the compelling Han Taejo.

If she fails to follow through, she’ll have to pay 5 billion won as penalty.

However, a marriage without love was not never on the independent chairman’s bucket list, so she offers for the two to sign a prenuptial agreement before their marriage.

However, the marriage contract that forcefully betrothed the two was tricky. Will Seung Hee’s plans for prenuptial agreement succeed or will love get in her way?>
